title: Willow glen remodeled designer style 3bed/2bath SFH  w/ huge yard
map_address: cross way near willow glen way
posting_body: Completely remodeled 3 bedroom, 2 bath room, 1,080 sq.
ft. home located in Willow Glen .

Located in a beautiful quiet neighborhood, yet close to schools, shops, restaurants, mall, and parks, just few minutes to down town San Jose, convenient commuter access to tech companies such as Google, Apple, Ebay, etc, easy access to freeway 280/110/87/880/17.
Everything in this house is brand new.
Hard surface flooring, beautiful kitchen features stainless steel appliances, quarts countertops, large island, and lot of storage space.
Huge living room, formal dinning area.
Large windows provide plenty of natural light, open kitchen provides enjoyment of cooking, wide patio door give access to a gorgeous deck in the back yard.
Master suite has a big shower room and closet.
Huge backyard provides spaces for outdoor living, excellent for kids.
Parking: attached 2-Car Garage
Tenants will bring their own washer/dryer.
Utilities: All utilities are Tenant responsibility
Rent: $4,995/month
Security Deposit ranges from $5,500
Photos for reference only, furnitures not included.
No smoking indoor
Minimum Lease Term: 6 months
Preferred Lease Term: 12 months
Pet Policy: 1 dog or cat less than 25 lbs is negotiable with a $500/pet security deposit increase and a $50/month pet admin fee.
$45/adult non-refundable application fee.
Applicants must have household monthly income at lease 3 times of rent, no felony record, have never been evicted, have no negative rental history.
Available Now.
